briefTitle: Study to Test the Value of a Pain Modulation Test in Predicting Persistent Postoperative Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Trial of Diagnostic Accuracy for the Prediction of Persistent Postoperative Pain After Breast Cancer Surgery Using a Conditioned Pain Modulation Test
primaryOutcomeMeasure: prevalence of pain at the site of surgery
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* age \>=18 years
* American Society of Anesthesiology functional status I-III
* able to read and understand the information sheet and give informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

none
